review_blob:
golden colour . Reasonably retentive head with good lacing. There is a delicate grapefruit and toast in the aroma,  The mouth feel is a tiny bit on the watery side. There are gentle soft malt flavours and a  gentle bitterness which leaves a  bitter marmalde and pepper aftertaste. 
this is an easy drinking refreshing beer.. Its a nice beer at a very nice price. Its delicately hopped  using Cascade,Golding and Fuggles. The cascade is noticeble in the aftertaste .
